show_name: Marco - From the Apennines to the Andes (TV)
other_title: From the Apennines to the Andes
Marco, De los Apeninos a los Andes (Spanish)
plot: Italy is in a deep depression, so to support her family, Marco's mother goes to Argentina to work as a domestic. But after she writes to her family that she is sick, her letters stop coming. So Marco decides to go to Argentina to look for her. He travels across Argentina to find her, meeting many wonderful people, and having many adventures during his journey.
opening_theme: "Sōgen no Marco" (草原のマルコ) by Kumiko Ohsugi
ending_theme: "Kaasan Ohayō" (かあさんおはよう) by Kumiko Ohsugi
